Subskills.name: Rapid Deployment
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of circle of guardians.

Subskills.name: Peer Pressure
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by circle of guardians.

Subskills.name: Desert's Army
Subskills.description: Summon a wall of guardians marching forward dealing increased damage, knocking monsters back on hit.

Subskills.name: Battalion of Guardians
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of sand guardians summoned.

Subskills.name: Devastating Lunge
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Lasting Sand Kingdom
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of circle of guardians.

Subskills.name: Well Trained Troops
Subskills.description: Increases the attack speed of circle of guardians.

Subskills.name: Magic Infused Blade
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Seven Nation Army
Subskills.description: Increases the amount and damage of circle of guardians.

Subskills.name: Far Reaching Spears
Subskills.description: Increases the attack range of circle of guardians.

Subskills.name: Everflowing Sands
Subskills.description: Sand guardians gain increased duration based on your energy.

Subskills.name: Manipulation
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by circle of guardians but each active guardian frequently drains your mana.

Subskills.name: Ancient Sand Goliath
Subskills.description: Summon an ancient sand goliath with increased size and damage based on summon amount for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Arcanic Sand Tether
Subskills.description: Create an arcanic sand tether between you and the circle of guardians dealing damage over time to monsters on hit.
